response.answer_text: Sellics has a wide range of usage and is uniquely designed for full-service and Amazon specialized agencies. It is used for Amazon SEO (keyword Research & ranking) and Amazon PPC (improving your ACoS and automation of campaigns). At Sellics, they offer three separate Amazon software platforms for sellers, vendors, and agencies. When you sell on Amazon, you are either a third-party seller selling direct-to-consumer or a vendor seller selling directly to Amazon as part of their retail program. Depending on your seller profile, you will have different business priorities and data tracking needs on Amazon. So, you should consider the right Sellics software package for yourself. Seller Edition of Sellics: The Seller Edition software is exclusively for Amazon sellers who use the Seller Central interface. This software covers all the basics when it comes to managing your direct-to-consumer sales on Amazon. Vendor Edition of Sellics: The Vendor Edition software is exclusively for Amazon vendors who use the Vendor Central interface. A vendor has different priorities when selling on Amazon (i.e. AMS management, Buy Box monitoring, etc.). It offers the leading Amazon optimization software on the market for vendors. Agency Edition of Sellics: The Agency Edition software is exclusively for agencies interested in using it for their Amazon clients. Agency partners also receive free membership to the Amazon Agency database of it, which is used by their customers looking for agency assistance for their Amazon business.
